page.title: 01WALTHAMSTOW MARKET
page.content: 1{Walthamstow Market is the longest {market in Europe.}It is a mile long. The market is open on Tuesday,Thursday,Friday and Saturday. The market is long and thin;because it is so thin when the stall holders pack up they have to wait an hour until they can get out. The council want to change it into a shopping centre so that they can get more tax. Saturday is the most profitable day. Some stallholders work in different markets such as Pitsea,Roman Road,Bishop and lots more. Packaging lies about the market. There are lots of different stalls down the market like grocery stalls,clothes stalls,jewellery stalls,sweet stalls,fruit stalls and lots more. There are mostly clothes stalls and grocery stalls.
